name: Nekomamushi
text: On Play: If your opponent has 7 or more rested cards, this character gains Rush. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

effect.text: If your opponent has 7 or more rested cards, this character gains Rush.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and has 'U' and 'C' in rarity box, indicating UC rarity. Power value is clearly 6000. Text includes '(This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)' which is part of the effect description.
